name: Tua
testimonial: Awesome job, they were very helpful and made us feel like we were included right the way through

name: Lisa Compton
testimonial: I was blown away by the quality of the design work I received from this service.

name: Richard Kerby
testimonial: Builtflat are a true asset to our business. Their knowledge, communication and proficiency is second to none. Easy to work with, always proactive with great ideas - they add a huge amount of value to us and our clients.

name: Phil Tidswell
testimonial: I wanted someone who would respond with ideas, with energy and with a commitment to delivering excellence but also to delivering on time, BuiltFlat easily accomplished these tasks.

name: Warwick Russell
testimonial: We are very happy with the website and have some great feedback on it and have enjoyed working with you and Jerry

name: Sara Powers
testimonial: Builtflat really are masters of their craft. If you're like me and sometimes struggle to keep up with all things technical, Sam and Jaromme somehow manage to demystify the jargon into a language that I can understand.

name: Daniell Ledge
testimonial: The Builtflat team seriously transformed my existing portfolio into something I'm more than happy with and communication was perfect right the way through.

name: Zoop
testimonial: New website and app design look great and the team were very helpful and responsive throughout the process.
